name: DRFPreview
description:
This is still work in progress, so please be aware. There are still things that need to be sorted out, e.g – the ice cream names, music text box names, other features, etc. This is just a quick demo to let you guys have a taster of Cabin Confiding. Some assets may be changed in the final product!

Only the first ice cream is accessible right now! You’ll be able to access more when the full Cabin Confiding game is released.

Rules:
- Do not rip our assets (music, sprites, art, graphics, backgrounds, etc).
- Do not use our assets without our permission.
- Do not reupload this. Commentary or streams are allowed.

Creators:
CrossPawGames (Elliot CM)
Moraiteru (Minnie C)

Game Dev:
Corey Hall

Artist:
Ysabel V
Gabrielle Teaford
titantwins
Choi

Voice Actor:
Dathromin (Devin J. McLaughlin)

Composer:
Stevie Pilgrim

Other assets:
TurboSquid
